senses.sense_definition: The excessive expression of a gene, resulting in higher than normal levels of a protein or other product.

examples.text: The study focused on the <w>superexpression</w> of the target gene in the modified plants.
Researchers noted that protein <w>superexpression</w> caused unexpected changes in the cell structure.

senses.sense_definition: An expression that contains multiple subexpressions.

examples.text: The algorithm parses the <w>superexpression</w> to evaluate the nested logic correctly.
A complex <w>superexpression</w> may be difficult to debug without breaking it down.
